title.rendered: D’LASHES 2019 GIFT GUIDE – HOLIDAY BEAUTY GIFTS

content.rendered:
D’LASHES 2019 GIFT GUIDE – HOLIDAY BEAUTY GIFTS PART 1

Oprah just came out with her favorite holiday gift list, and here at D’Lashes we have our very own favorite holiday gift guide. I will be posting more of my favorite gifts for November and December. Happy shopping!

D’Lashes Lipgloss: Get beautiful glossy holiday lips with D’Lashes gloss. This gloss is available in many stunning colors and has a long lasting beautiful diamond glow.

Dyson Hair Dryer: Treat yourself or someone you love with this limited edition holiday red hair dryer. Everyone who owns this hair dryer said that it cuts down hair drying time by 50-70%. It also keeps your hair healthy and smooth. This limited edition set comes with a beautiful red storage case.

Here is a description from Nordstrom.com

What it does: It increases hair smoothness by 75%, increases shine by up to 132% and decreases frizz and flyaways by up to 61% (versus naturally dried hair, results may vary). Small and powerful, its digital V9 motor combined with Air Multiplier™ technology produces a high-velocity jet of controlled air for fast drying and precision styling.

Features and benefits:

– Engineered for different hair types with a range of attachments designed to style all kinds of hair.

– Helps prevent extreme heat damage through intelligent heat control, which measures the air temperature over 40 times a second to prevent extreme heat damage.

– Precise speed and heat settings deliver fast drying and styling, regular drying and gentle drying with a constant cool flow.

– Negative ions help reduce static in the hair.

LOOK: The festive red holiday look is from FWRD.COM. 

Chanel: This beautiful Chanel cosmetic bag with nail polish and lipstick is always on my gift-giving list.

D’Lashes Holiday Special Edition Candles: These candles are hand-poured and made with coconut and soy.

Silk Sleep Mask: This beautiful silk mask will keep your lashes in place while you sleep. Makes for a perfect beauty gift and this one is from Slip.

YSL Wallet: You can’t go wrong with a beautiful YSL wallet for that special friend or family member.

P.S. Book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

 

XO XO, DIONNE
